channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Find My Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Find My Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-30742|2024-08-03T06:56:14.013Z -- samsung%20mobile -- find%20my%20mobile
item.description: Sensitive information exposure vulnerability in FmmExtraOperation of Find My Mobile prior to 7.2.24.12 allows local attackers with log access permissio to get sim card information through device log.

item.title: CVE-2022-36878|2024-08-03T10:14:28.944Z -- samsung%20mobile -- find%20my%20mobile
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information in Find My Mobile prior to version 7.2.25.14 allows local attacker to access IMEI via log.

item.title: CVE-2022-30741|2024-08-03T06:56:14.019Z -- samsung%20mobile -- find%20my%20mobile
item.description: Sensitive information exposure vulnerability in SimChangeAlertManger of Find My Mobile prior to 7.2.24.12 allows local attackers with log access permission to get sim card information through device log.
